snippet: On his first visit to Baghdad since the beginning of the American-led military campaign against the Islamic State, Gen. Martin E. Dempsey said he wanted to get a sense of how the troops were doing.
abstract: Joint Chiefs of Staff Chairman Gen Martin E Dempsey arrives in Iraq on his first visit since the beginning of the American-led military campaign against the Islamic State extremists; says he is looking for a sense of how American contribution is going; Iraqi government and allied militia leaders say they have recaptured control of a major refinery under siege for months by militants.
lead_paragraph: On his first visit to Baghdad since the beginning of the American-led military campaign against the Islamic State, Gen. Martin E. Dempsey said he wanted to get a sense of how the troops were doing.

headline.main: Top General Arrives in Baghdad to See U.S. Contribution in Fight Against ISIS
headline.print_headline: Top General Arrives in Baghdad to See U.S. Contribution in Fight Against ISIS

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
